title: Safe, Simple, and Reliable
text: UW Cache is a platform for students at the University of Waterloo to share a space for storage while their peers are on their co-op term! After creating an account, youâ€™ll become a valued member of an activley growing UW Cache community. Once you are logged in, you can view current avalible storage positings from students or you can upload a listing to help your peers. All parties will be required to provide their UW email and optionally their phone number to ensure the safe and security of UW Cache. Contact information will be shared amoung the two parties so that a direct connection exists for communication means and any other details about the asset.

section.title: List a Posting
section.content: Click the 'List Asset' button to add an item. This can be as broad as 'Production Equipment' or as specific as 'Label Printer'. People will be able to book your item through a form, or contact you directly.

section.title: Connect with a Posting
section.content: Found an avaiable space that is suitable? Click on it and book the space for the avaibale time. Need to talk more? Contact the other party directly through the given contact information.
